purpose: Enhance PowerShell scripting with AI-driven capabilities, enabling automation and intelligent task execution
principle: Leverages OpenAI's language models to provide natural language processing and autonomous agent functionalities within PowerShell scripts
reusability: Can be integrated into existing PowerShell scripts and workflows, providing AI functions as PowerShell cmdlets
limitations: Dependent on internet connectivity for AI model access, limited to tasks that can be expressed within PowerShell's capabilities
name: PSAI
description: PowerShell AI module. Think ChatGPT meets PowerShell - Includes Autonomous Agents
highlight: Integrates AI capabilities directly into PowerShell for automation and scripting
